report.title: More Than Normal High
report.author: The First born
report.bodytext: I received cyclobenzaprine from my doctor because of back pain, a symptom I had been controlling up until that point with weed, but still bothered me at work (since I don't smoke before work). /n /n The first time I took the cyclobenzaprine I took the prescribed dose and thinking that its wasnt doing anything I decided to smoke a spliff to deal with the back pain (and boredom). After about an hour I noticed I was more than high from the weed. I felt very much detached from my body. /n /n Another interesting thing was the coming down. Normally I just start to feel less stoned after 2 hours or so. But with the cyclobenzaprine in my system I stayed drowsy and introspective until I went to bed. That night I slept like a baby.
